PublicDescription: Level-1 Data TLB miss in progress. Incremented by one for every cycle a DTLB1 miss is in progress.
Level-1 Instruction TLB miss in progress. Incremented by one for every cycle a ITLB1 miss is in progress.
A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from the Level-2 Instruction cache
A directory write to the Level-1 Instruction cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from the Level-2 Instruction cache
A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from the Level-2 Data cache
A translation entry has been written to the Level-1 Data Translation Lookaside Buffer
A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache where the installed cache line was sourced from memory that is attached to the same book as the Data cache (Local Memory)
A directory write to the Level-1 Instruction cache where the installed cache line was sourced from memory that is attached to the same book as the Instruction cache (Local Memory)
A directory write to the Level-1 D-Cache where the line was originally in a Read-Only state in the cache but has been updated to be in the Exclusive state that allows stores to the cache line
A translation entry has been written to the Level-1 Data Translation Lookaside Buffer for a one-megabyte page
A translation entry has been written to the Level-1 Instruction Translation Lookaside Buffer
A translation entry has been written to the Level-2 TLB Page Table Entry arrays
A translation entry has been written to the Level-2 TLB Common Region Segment Table Entry arrays for a one-megabyte large page translation
A translation entry has been written to the Level-2 TLB Common Region Segment Table Entry arrays
A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an On Chip Level-3 cache without intervention
A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an Off Chip/On Book Level-3 cache without intervention
A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an Off Book Level-3 cache without intervention
A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an On Book Level-4 cache
A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an Off Book Level-4 cache

BriefDescription: Aborted transactions in non-constrained TX mode
PublicDescription: A transaction abort has occurred in a nonconstrained transactional-execution mode

BriefDescription: Aborted transactions in constrained TX mode not using special completion logic
PublicDescription: A transaction abort has occurred in a constrained transactional-execution mode and the CPU is not using any special logic to allow the transaction to complete

BriefDescription: Aborted transactions in constrained TX mode using special completion logic
PublicDescription: A transaction abort has occurred in a constrained transactional-execution mode and the CPU is using special logic to allow the transaction to complete
